name: insolation
description:
click inside the embed to start, use arrow keys/WASD to navigate.

insolation was made with BItsy, Bitsy-savior, the bitsy hacks repo, and other community tools for ludum dare 50. 

bitsy games tend to have simple controls. the arrow keys input direction and dialog progression. if you see an animated or differently colored item, interacting with it may start a dialog prompt. some items may be invisible. when dialog starts, it is best to wait until a downward facing triangle appears before hitting an arrow key again.

insolation (n.) sudden prostration due to exposure to the sun or excessive heat;

Synonyms: sunstroke / thermic fever / siriasis

insolation (n.)  incident solar radiation;

Synonyms: unknown

insolation (n.) therapeutic exposure to sunlight;

Synonyms: heliotherapy
